item.title: A New Theme
item.author: jakob.kuelzer@gmail.com (Jakob Külzer)
item.description: After toying around with the really nice Temple theme I decided there was no better way to spend my afternoon than building my own, new theme for my blog. If you haven’t notice, I recently switched my blog from Jekyll to Hugo. The upgrade path from the really old version of Jekyll to the latest version wasn’t quite working as expected, and having to mess around with Gemfiles isn’t really something I enjoy.
